alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Upson, southwestern Crawford and northern Taylor Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fickling Mill, or 8 miles north of Butler. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Roberta, Reynolds, Salem, Carsonville, Wesley Church and Fickling Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
